import pandas as pd

def filter_rows(df, column):
    df = df.dropna(subset=[column])
    df = df[df['Age'] > 20].sort_values('', ascending=False)
    return df

import pandas as pd

def filter_rows(df, column):
    df = df.dropna(subset=[column])
    df = df[df['Age'] > 20].sort_values('Name', ascending=True)
    return df
